From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To display platform supervisor information, use the **show platform supervisor** command in privileged EXEC mode.
CLIs: show platform supervisor mtu slot <slot-number> port <port-number>

ParaDef.Info: Displays supervisor operating Maximum Tranmission Unit (MTU).
Displays information for the specified slot.
Displays information for the specified port.

Examples: The following is sample output from the show platform supervisor command. The fields are self-explanatory.
Router# show platform supervisor mtu slot 5 port 1
